commit.message:
gensupport.c (process_one_cond_exec): Derive name for COND_EXEC patterns from predicated pattern.

	* gensupport.c (process_one_cond_exec): Derive name for COND_EXEC
	patterns from predicated pattern.

From-SVN: r156831
